name: nougat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a thick, sweet food made from sugar cooked with the white parts of eggs, usually containing nuts and sometimes fruit. It can be hard enough to cut in pieces, or soft and used to fill chocolates, cakes, etc. : Turron is a traditional Spanish confection made of nougat. He left the children gifts of nougat and lollipops.
